com.codecool.shop.dao

Class ScriptRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.ScriptRunner

  • public class ScriptRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    The ScriptRunner class is a pre-written class that makes it possible to run the sql script files. It creates a create_db.log and create_db_error.log files.
